website_summaries.verdict: Large, wide size makes it perfect for a roast and all the trimmings, potlucks, or casseroles.
pros: Perfect if you entertain, or like slow-cooking roasts, whole chickens, or casseroles and pasta dishes like lasagna
cons: If left on the high setting for long periods, the paint on the outside can peel off

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this crock pot less than 4 months ago. The first couple of times I cooked with it & it worked great, but then it began cooking the food too quickly even on the low setting. Now unfortunately it's not getting my meals cooked on time at all. Whether I use the low or high setting even after 7 hours of cooking time food is not done. It's such a beautiful pot & I wanted so much to love it, but in this case looks by itself is not good enough. My family deserves better! Not sure what to do with it now:(
customer_reviews.author: Utilena

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ZERO STARS! CROCKPOT WAS IN USED CONDITION! DRIED FOOD ON THE OUTSIDE, HEAT MARKS ON THE INSIDE! ABSOLUTELY UNEXCEPTIONABLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: This is so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool crock-pot. I use my large one for chicken and main meals. In this one, I put squash, potatoes, vegetables or sides. It's perfect! Now, I don't have to stand at the stove at all. I throw everything in the two pots and all I clean up are the two inserts. I think it would work good for lasagna too. It is on the shallow side. If you want to cook chicken, it fits 6 or 7 chicken breasts or 12 thighs. Cooks perfectly! Be careful...it gets *very hot* on the outside! (The red metal)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not get hot enough to cook lasagna or anything else for that matter. It takes me almost two-three hours longer to make food in this casserole crockpot compared to my conventional oval crockpot. The first one I was sent stopped hearing after the 3rd use. I returned it and the second one isn't much better. It's only useful if you bake with the glass insert and use it as a warmer. Total piece of crap. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Moore

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for my mom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who does a lot of hosting and often brings casseroles to work Carry-ins. She really loves the locking future so that she can travel with it and not worry about it spilling in her vehicle. The color matches her kitchen and it is very easy to clean. I do wish the size it was a little bit bigger - I included a couple photos with a standard roll of paper towels in the dish to help provide a better representation of its size. Overall, it was a great gift to my mom and she is pleased with it. I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cabinet space
customer_reviews.text: My regular slow cooker died, and I thought this would be good for taking casseroles and cobblers to potlucks. The folks who were concerned about how hot it gets on the bottom are right. It was so hot, and close to my laminate counter tops, that I put it on silicone hot pads, then a cookie sheet. The ceramic dish got much hotter around the edges, so my food got brown and crunchy around the edges while the middle was just warm. The metal cooker part is super hot. The whole setup is so big, and so heavy, that it just didn't justify the space it takes. I returned it and ordered an insulated carrier for a 9x13 pan instead.
customer_reviews.author: She loves a deal

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice crock pot
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice crock pot. So convenient! It truly is the same as a baking dish with the convenience of a crock pot. I like the locking lid. This will make for very convenient ease when transporting. Cleaning it is easy since the casserole portion is removable. I prebaked in the casserole in the oven ahead of time, then kept it heated until ready to serve. So far I really like this and would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for big holiday meals
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for holiday meals. We use it for dressings, casseroles and other items that require a long time to cook. Frees up oven space for other dishes. We will definitely purchase another for our production line for big family meals. Makes getting everything on the table in time easier. The outside does get hot but we take caution knowing this. I will purchase the programmable next time and use it to have meals ready when returning home. Great way to to cook healthy and avoid grabbing something quick and not so healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia E Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Crock Pot
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this product because it seems I am going to a LOT of potlucks lately. I made a Baked Ziti casserole in this and it was perfect! It cooked evenly and was perfectly hot and ready to eat. And the handles make it really easy to transport. Due to back problems I have a weight limit and this unit does not exceed that limit. It isn't exactly light weight, but not so heavy that I could not carry it. And I wasn't worried about spilling because the lid not only locks down, but has a really good rubber seal. I can't wait to try more recipes and my friends and family cannot wait for more either!
customer_reviews.author: Eggchick

customer_reviews.title: Love the design of this crockpot.
customer_reviews.text: Love this crockpot! I initially got this as a gift for my mom, but ended up registering for one on my wedding registry as well. The colors and design are much better looking than most versions and while I don’t leave it out all the time, I certainly don’t mind when it’s sitting out while I’m using it. The shape makes it easier to store away. This is the perfect size for meals for a family or 2-5 and also great for dips or desserts when serving a crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: didn't cook a roast in 8 hours
customer_reviews.text: I used the crock pot for the first time yesterday. I put a roast on at 10am. Really looking forward to enjoying dinner by 6pm. Roast was not anywhere near cooked. Carrots still hard. Of course I got look to see about returning it. Closed return date 10/13. I am so upset. I have had this brand of crockpot before. This heating element must be faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but won't last.
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, nice for use at the dinner table, but ruined with a thin, cheap lid gasket almost guaranteed to wear out in less than a year. It takes a ten year appliance and puts it in the class of a TV ad impulse buy. I hand washed the thing and the seal deformed the first time I put the lid back on before I even closed the latches.
customer_reviews.author: hdctx

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this size for parties and transporting hot casseroles.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this size! Perfect for bringing casserole type dishes to parties, and I'm finding it stays extremely warm without any problem. In fact, more often than not I have to use the lowest setting instead of high. Very easy to transport to events, much less bulky than bringing the traditional crock pot, and it looks much prettier on the table. Bonus points for the latching lid for transport.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N

customer_reviews.title: Crock-Pot 3.5-Quart Casserole Crock Manual Slow Cooker, Charcoal
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this rectangular Crock Pot.she's made several dishes in it since I gave it to her Dec 29th. Her only complaint is that either the crock is too large to sit fully submerged in our SS sink, or our standard size 8" deep sink is too small for the crock. Does this mean a complete kitchen remodel is in order ?Hmmmmm
customer_reviews.author: JDDD

customer_reviews.title: Great for 9x13 style dishes so bottom layer doesn't smash!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these for over a year. Finally caved in when I had to bring reformed beans to a party and my current crocks were all way too big. This worked perfectly! Bigger flat area insured the beans all heated evenly. The next night I took diced "fried" potatoes. They stayed perfect "with some diced up bacon, ranch seasoning and cheese) without smashing the bottom layer like would have happened in my other crocks. Sold two more people on them. Lol. Love love love. Mad I waited to get it!!
customer_reviews.author: cass van

customer_reviews.title: Great as a consistent buffet warmer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on thanksgiving. Since I had kind of an open house vibe this year I decided to roast the turkey then carve it and keep it warm for the rest of the day. This worked perfectly and I fit the equivalent of a 14 lb turkey in it easily. The white meat on one side and the dark on the other. Kept the meat at a safe temp without drying it out. It was perfect and I’m going to repeat the trick for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased 7
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these and have given several as gifts. I often use them for egg casseroles and french toast for department breakfasts. I also love these for lasagna and other casseroles. I did have someone break the lock on my lid and it has been a hassle to attempt to get a replacement (and hasn't been replaced). Please note that it was broken off cuz he didn't realize it was locked and was overly forceful with it. Two of mine are digital and one manual. I love all there. I would highly recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality,  just watch the heat
customer_reviews.text: Use in my trailer, bought to save on space. Love that you can make a lasagna among lots of other things. The cord is way too short. Ended up buying an extension cord equipped to handle the job. And the out side gets extremely hot, so I'm very careful about where it sits, and what its next too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love my crockpots!
customer_reviews.text: I am the crockpot cooker queen! And I don’t know how I’ve ever missed the rectangular size. But, I use it every week. Roasts,casseroles, enchiladas, etc. The oval and rectangular shapes are a big improvement over the over the older deep round crockpot style.
customer_reviews.author: Peebody's

customer_reviews.title: It is OK but I would spend more to get a better product in the future
customer_reviews.text: I've used this once to cook lasagna. Worked fine. I was disappointed in the exterior. It is very thin and is hot to the touch. I can see how it melted in certain situations. Also the lid and gasket was not a perfect fit but it will do. I would probably invest a little more money for a sturdier product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this 3 times and each time it works great. I live the low profile and that you can put it in the oven. Only negative all the little rubber feet have pulled off 3 are lost. In fact Thais happened first time I used it. I’ve looked to buy new, I see them on the crockpot website just can’t find where to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: A Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I make crockpot lasagna and this works awesome! And love the navy color! If you like to make casseroles in the crockpot this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this quite a few times now without any problems. I does get very hot, so you have to be careful. It has cooked evenly and just like cooking in the oven without heating up the kitchen on warm days for just a small casserole dish. I like it very much so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this crock pot but I had it plugged in and on high for over an hour and the stick of butter hadn't even started to melt. The ceramic wasn't warming but the outer metal shell was super hot...I don't think they are making contact. Unfortunately I waited too long to use it so the return window closed or else it would definitely go back! Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Tana Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It may not be digital and I’m okay with that. Love that the lid locks and that when I need to make something that requires being kept warm but not wanting to lug a big pot this allows me to that. *Eggs for my daughters track team no problem and doesn’t wind up being runny from sitting in a pot.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Good - but not an everyday crock pot
customer_reviews.text: This works well for some dishes that might need stirring as you don't have to dig down so far and it cooks more evenly for those types of dishes. It works well for frozen lasagna in a crock pot bag and as it thaws it slides down into the pan. I find 2 drawbacks: the cord is pretty short and the outside gets REALLY hot.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Tassler

customer_reviews.title: Love Love this crock pot
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/7/2020; I have this crock pot since Aug 2016. It's still my favorite. Right now a breakfast casserole is cooking on low overnight, I know it will be great, I'm going to buy a second one for a hope chest. I hope she loves it as much as I love mine Love Love this crock pot! I love everything about it. I haven't stopped using it, since I purchased it. Only one word of caution, DO NOT use metal utensils, they ruin the crock surface.
customer_reviews.author: cissie

customer_reviews.title: Everybody NEEDS this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hIGHLY recommend this. It is the perfect size for our family of 8 and I always have leftovers, which is perfect to take the dish right out of the fridge, set it in and plug it in again. This crockpot doesnt take as long as a regular 6Qt oval crockpot to cook through either which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived chipped.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic handles feel cheap. It will probably do the trick but I don't find this crockpot as nice as my other two Crock-Pots. More concerned about large chip out of bottom upon arrival. I can't figure out who to contact. Only let's me leave review, no contact info. Anyone know?
customer_reviews.author: RunninMore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cooker did not heat up when I plugged it in. Thank goodness I had not put any food in the dish yet. It came with a very badly damaged box and I think it had been damaged during shipping. I am very disappointed that I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: ShezaRealtor

customer_reviews.title: Company won't stand behind product
customer_reviews.text: Used this product for less than three months when I noticed a hairline crack in the bottom of the crock. Talked to Amazon customer service about the issue and was told they would give me a $5 CREDIT towards the purchase of a new crockpot. Seriously? This item cost me close to $50, why would I spend additional money for a product that the manufacturer won't stand behind and I couldn't trust to do the same thing, possibly creating a hazard in my home while I am away? My last Crock-pot lasted my 20 years without a problem - thought I was buying from a reputable company but am sincerely disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda LaForte

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for casseroles. Was able to bake using the stoneware dish in the oven, transfer to the outer crockpot container, lock lid and go. I preheated the crockpot and it keep the dish warm for the 1 1/2 hour drive to the family gathering. Once there, plugged in, kept on warm and simply too the stoneware baking dish out of the crockpot heating element and put on table. Cleaning was very easy. I can see using this a lot. Inside measurements of baking dish are 9" x 11" x 2.5" deep
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size and shape but unfortunately doesnt get hot enough like a round crock pot. Roast that typically takes 4-5 hrs took nearly 9.
customer_reviews.author: M Novello

customer_reviews.title: Works fine and does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and does what it's supposed to do. The ceramic cooking dish is very heavy and there is no timer on it so you can't set it and expect it to turn itself to "keep warm" like you can on some other crock pots. Overall no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CTE

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Crock Pot
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome. I love the short, casserole profile. Plus, it is very pretty to take to a potluck. Everyone wanted to know where I got it. Of course, I said Amazon. Would buy another one if I had room to store it. Also, the lid locks on for portability and it has handles to carry it on the go.
customer_reviews.author: S. Seward

customer_reviews.title: Works great, like 9x13 as opposed to deep bowl of other crock pots
customer_reviews.text: Used to keep baked ziti warm for school function. Also baked thanksgiving dressing in oven then kept warm. Love this crockpot. Only concern are how the plastic handles will hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Nanarminda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect casserole size
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for smaller dishes! I love it. The navy blue color is really pretty. I took it to a church carry in and received multiple compliments. Cooks just like the bigger ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ness in Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t latch correctly
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the other reviews before I purchased it and I should have listened to them. The lid latches will not latch at the same time, 1 will latch and than the other won’t unless I unlock it and move the lid over but than the first latch won’t latch.
customer_reviews.author: linnea neuendorf

customer_reviews.title: Crock Pot Casserole
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a wedding gift. I have the same item in red. It is a good size to cook or bake many different items. Also a great warmer for left overs, even pizza and dough based.
customer_reviews.author: gingergrilli

customer_reviews.title: Great for PotLucks
customer_reviews.text: I've used this so many times since I've bought it and everyone who sees it wants one. Great for casseroles or use a warming dish for almost anything you can think of. it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 crocker
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery service. A good 'pot' for a couple or a single person. I also have a larger one in a round shape. I don't know about the cleaning as I use a liner
customer_reviews.author: Ret Leo

customer_reviews.title: awesome crockpot
customer_reviews.text: looked in every store for this crock pot. Perfect for casseroles, makes perfect tater tot casserole- the ceramic dish comes out to bake in oven & then put in back in holder to keep warm..
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best crock pot for serving ever created!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite serving dish, I use it for large BBQ items like Brisket and Pulled Pork and it works amazingly well. I've also used it for warm items where I can use the removable insert to bake in and then set to keep warm. I would buy a few more if the wife would allow it.
customer_reviews.author: IbuytoomuchinChicago

customer_reviews.title: Casserole
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I can slip it out of the heating element and pop into the oven to brown marshmallows topping and then back into the element to serve. People are amazed that you can brown marshmallows in a crock pot!😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Tanis

customer_reviews.title: Great size for serving a one dish meal.
customer_reviews.text: The rectangular design of this crop pot is ideal for putting on the table and serving from it. I have one and I got one for my sister-in-law and she uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Great for casseroles, just like a 9x13 pan.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great crock pot for casseroles and dips. The lid locks on super tight and it’s great for taking to parties. I wasn’t sure I’d like a rectangular shaped crock pot, but this has become my absolute favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: I got my crock pot casserole today. When I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got my crock pot casserole today. When I opened the box, the crockpot label was bent and the left side of it was pointing up. It took everything I had to straighten it and even then it wasn't originally put in the right spot. It definitely wasn't centered. The front was really scratched up. I was scared that it wasn't going to work due to all the outside damage so I plugged out in and set it to high. Thank goodness it at least worked. I just really don't think that mine was worth what i paid for it
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Dixon Land

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: After one trial, I bought a second one for my daughter. It works great and the longer shallow dish was perfect for a sweet potato casserole. Since I wasn't sure of the timing, I baked it in the oven and then slid the dish into the crockpot to plug in to keep it warm during morning service. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sherrylynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for pot lucks!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this right before the holiday season. Toted this crock pot to all the holiday parties and pot luck and it worked like a charm. Loved being able to cook in it and then lock down the lid and take it with me without having to worry about the contents slipping out. Even used this on Christmas morning for a hash brown casserole so I didn't have to fuss that morning. Just mixed all the ingredients that night before and put it on low. The casserole was ready when I was ready to serve breakfast! Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Anaheim

customer_reviews.title: Great crockpot for dinners
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased a new crockpot in over 40 years so it was a big decision when I finally decided to start looking. I am so glad I picked this one. It is not for soups or stews but it's great for roasts, pork chops and vegetable. And it looks beautiful in my kitchen. The blue is quite spectacular. My daughter has the purple and it too is spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berfield

customer_reviews.title: It’s Functional, But Could Use Better Hinge Design!
customer_reviews.text: It’s biggerthan it looks! Good for a family, not so much for a single person. Also the pin on one of the hinges comes out routinely. I fixed it with a hairpin. It’s not good for whole chickens or bigger roast.
customer_reviews.author: Melba Yates

customer_reviews.title: shipper was not doing a decent job of protecting product from ambien weather conditions
customer_reviews.text: did not like that the shipper allowed this to get totally water logged. The carton was completely soaked - left out in the weather (rain) -the cooker seemed ok - this was shipper (carrier's) fault!!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Pot lucks, holiday meals & more
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this crockpot to use for family holidays, bigger meals & pot lucks. Recently used this for a pot luck, perfect for warming & transporting dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, not the sturdiest construction.
customer_reviews.text: Top latches feel a little bit like they are going to break. Front logo sticker curled up after a single use. Sides get VERY hot during use. Works perfect though. Affordable price is appropriate for quality of build.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kane

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Don’t use it like a traditional crock ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! Don’t use it like a traditional crock pot. Haven’t cooked meat. It’s great for pasta dishes and easy to carry looks nice sitting on the buffet
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garry

customer_reviews.title: I never knew this existed and now I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot is perfect for casseroles as well as anything that typically cooks in a shallow baking dish. The added benefit is that it is PERFECT for taking to pot lucks or to a family function where you have been asked to bring a hot dish. I took it to a work function and there were many coworkers with "crock pot envy" at my stylish casserole dish. Great for enchiladas, lasagna, pasta bakes and chicken breasts. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Dunworth

customer_reviews.title: Elec pan
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it yet but being said that it looks like it’s going to be easy to clean and to cook I’m glad I got it
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Berger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lasagna
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite things to cook with. It's great for lasagna and casseroles and cleanup is a breeze. Absolutely no complaints. I've bought these as gifts and everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Classy Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this crockpot looks and it cooks just as well. I was worried about the depth, since it is the depth of a casserole, but I have cooked soup and meat dishes with it and have not had a problem. I would not be able to cook a whole chicken in in, but I usually use my dutch oven for that anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Weber

customer_reviews.title: Best style of cooked
customer_reviews.text: This is my third casserole crock and I love it. It’s perfect for church and family functions. It makes a great warmer.
customer_reviews.author: SpicyJalepeno

customer_reviews.title: This is huge and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Should have read more closely -- this is a very large piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Podley

customer_reviews.title: Used only once
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this one time. The latch broke off from the crock pot. It is plastic. Should have been better quality. Since I had it for 2 months, I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. Waste of cabinet space
customer_reviews.text: Tried cooking a few different casseroles in this crock-pot. Items (potatoes/veggies) never fully cooked through. Even after plenty of hours.....very disappointed. Waste of cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: F. R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh. Where has this been all my life. I love to use crockpots. This is great!Love it! I like the fact that it can go from crock pot cookie to oven.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon tyler

customer_reviews.title: Cracked dish!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it very bad reviews because I only used this once and the insert dish has a huge crack! I’m so mad! I bought this a long while ago so I can’t even return it for my money back
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Very, very slow cooker.....
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but is a sssssllllllloooooowwww cooker... If you have 12 hours, it works ok, but after 2 hours on high, it is not close to bubbling the liquid. Great idea, just wish it cooked a little better.
customer_reviews.author: rog

customer_reviews.title: Great concept and makes for a great presentation of crock ...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept and makes for a great presentation of crock casseroles but the stoneware liner is huge and hard to fit in a sink for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful concept and product.
customer_reviews.text: It's great to have a casserole sized crock pot/slow cooker. Cooks much faster (low setting only one used so far) than recipes state, and a little unevenly (one side was more done than the other), but I love the idea of being able to make a casserole in the summer without having to turn on the oven. Also glad it cooks quickly, even though my first trial was just a bit overdone. Still tasted great!
customer_reviews.author: AntKathy

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome for cooking in the oven and keeping it warm after.
customer_reviews.text: Great to cook food in the over and from the over right into the warmer. My only complaint is that the outside gets VERY hot. Love the lock down lid!!
customer_reviews.author: Tc8322

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I used this crock pot and was disappointed at the results. First of all the outside gets hot. Secondly it took forever for the "hot" setting to get hot. Even after hours of being on, the food was only warm. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karin J

customer_reviews.title: Good crock pot and doesn't leak during travel.Can use the inside crock in the reg oven
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and works well. Can use the crock casserole fish in the oven ,than place in outside cooker to keep warm.comes with a sm paper cookbook with a lot of good recipes
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome size
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot fits in so nicely, I love to put casseroles in it! However, it gets very hot to the touch, so beware if you have little ones around!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this new crockpot design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great casserole crockpot for those times that a deep dish crock doesn't work - lasagna, ribs, desserts. I still use my traditional deep crockpot for soups, stews, spiced cider, I love having both. The locking lid is a nice feature for transporting to a potluck. The stoneware lifts out and clean up is easy. I love the purple color - makes mine easy to spot on a potluck table full of dishes. Cooks evenly, no stirring required.
customer_reviews.author: Mooselady

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Large group came for dinner, this helped with potatoes casserole, sickie only have one oven.
customer_reviews.author: betme

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lasagna!
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control is simple — high-med-low-warm. The first thing I made was lasagna. I started it in the oven and completed in the cooker. I didn’t have time to cook it in the Crock-Pot beginning to end — but I will try that next time! I do like the size. Perfect for lasagna! The carrier is nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Crock Pot Especially for pot lucks and parties
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The stone dish comes out, so you can do your baked ziti, lasagna or whatever in the oven, and then keep it warm for pot lucks and parties. I love the locking lid too, makes it much easier to transport without making a mess in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Green

customer_reviews.title: works great but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little crock just big enough for two, the only draw back is it is heavy but the dish is made to be oven safe as well so not sure if thy could come up with something lighter or not?
customer_reviews.author: Moore2Life

customer_reviews.title: Cooks a roast really nice
customer_reviews.text: I've mostly cooked Chuck roasts with potatoes. I like not having so much extra space in the pot. It works very nicely for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Best Crockpot in My Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This crockpot should be in every kitchen in America. It is well made, attractive, and the perfect size for most dishes. I have found that the shape of the pan allows for even cooking. The gasket on the lid provides an excellent seal. I transported a side dish that I made in the oven in the crockpot dish to my brother's house for thanksgiving. I had no worries of it spilling of cooling along the way. This is now my go-to crockpot!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Fire ,one month return date
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat sparks. Works on high,real high. How would you like to come home to roasted ash. Or fire damage. Did not expect this from crock-pot brand. Product worthless. So is return date,missed by five days !
customer_reviews.author: Thorn

customer_reviews.title: lid doesn't fit right. lets in air on two ...
customer_reviews.text: lid doesn't fit right. lets in air on two corners.I called the Crock Pot company and was told that it was supposed to be that way. I looked at one in Walmart and the lid sat evenly on all four corners.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Crock Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crock pot - works great!! Only down side is the short cord to plug in. Has to be close to the outlet. If I had to guess it is less than 2 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: L. Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Best slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slow cooker over a year ago and I use it all the time period I take it to parties when I need to bring dishes to share. I liked it so well then I bought one for a coworker for our secret santa gift exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did anyone have a problem with this making the counter ...
customer_reviews.text: Did anyone have a problem with this making the counter under it EXTREMELY hot? I am afraid to leave it on when not home due to how hot the counter is.....almost left a scorch mark!
customer_reviews.author: susan patterson

customer_reviews.title: Nice size crock pot, no light to indicate it's turned on
customer_reviews.text: Great idea to make this type of crock pot. Good size 13x9, just like a cake pan. Only thing I don't like about it is that there is no light that shows it's turned on. The dial says it is, but usually crock pots have a light.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this addition to my crock pots I use! It’s great for potlucks and using at home to feed a hungry family. Very pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: JewlsB

customer_reviews.title: Not as versatile as I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This product only allows you to cook certain things. It does not have the same depth as a crock-pot. I should have paid more attention to the measurements. I was able to cook a pre-sliced ham on Christmas Eve but would have never been able to cook a spiral. The product is good but not as versatile as I had hope for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: greatest crockpot ever!!
customer_reviews.text: i am so happy they made this!! being able to put the liner in the oven when i get home to brown the tops of casseroles it awesome!! i also love that i can take this anywhere without fear of spills. i cannot wait for thanksgiving, this thing is going to save me so much time!!! and the color is absolutely beautiful!! every woman needs one of these!! i think i will get more for xmas presents this year.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gregory

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my wife project and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer75

customer_reviews.title: best for about everything
customer_reviews.text: For everything you make from dips to cheesy hash browns this is the best. This was the best received gift from my wife this year.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product for the price. It heats up fast and bakes quicker than my casserole dishes. Already asked Santa to bring me another one for Christmas. My daughter in law also loves it so plan on getting her one for her.
customer_reviews.author: OCD

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So I use this to melt wax for processing leather goods, no idea if it works on food. Great Temp control though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape of this slow cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I love using this slow cooker. I can see everything and it is great for serving.
customer_reviews.author: jeannette daniels

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can make casseroles or side dishes for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that you can make casseroles or side dishes for a party in this crockpot. The locking lid it perfect for taking the crockpot to parties!
customer_reviews.author: Brittny

customer_reviews.title: Great for casseroles & perfect for a 4 person family.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but I like having something that's not a traditional size crockpot. The inside crockpot is the size of a traditional 9x13 baking dish. If you're expecting something deeper you will be disappointed. I like the latching lid and the carrying handle. It's nice and compact and fits neatly on my shelf. Great for casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Sison

customer_reviews.title: Best decision to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've been wanting a casserole crock for a while now and I definitely don't regret making this purchase. This makes it so easy to prepare meals that you would usually make in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. My husbands work wanted to do a pot luck at a training day but I wnated them to send a casserole instead of using a regular crockpot. It was perfect and my dish was the only one devoured!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: I RETURNED IT BECAUSE IT WAS FAR MORE THAN I NEEDED. I CAN'T COMMENT ON IT TOO MUCH.
customer_reviews.author: SUE CORYELL

customer_reviews.title: Always being cautious.  It’s not a toy.
customer_reviews.text: I think I’m going to really enjoy this crockpot. Love the 9x13 feature. Bought my daughters one too. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: eej

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself as a Christmas gift! I love crockpots and this one is one of my favorites! Great gift for that special cook in your life!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Keck

product_meta.title: Crock-Pot SCCPCCM350-BL Manual Slow Cooker, Navy Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:Navy BlueThe Crock-Pot 3.5-Quart Casserole Crock Slow Cooker makes family dinners, potlucks, parties, and of course, make-ahead meals easier than ever. The utlimate kitchen workhorse, the Casserole Crock is so versatile that you can use it to prepare everyone's favorite casserole dishes, desserts, and more, either by plugging it in on the countertop or by placing just the stoneware in a conventional oven. Easily portable, the Casserole Crock uses the Cook & Carry locking lid system for easy transport, without spills or mess.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Includes top-rated Campbell's recipes like green bean, scalloped potato, and cheesy chicken casseroles. 3.5-quart slow cooker with manual heat settings (low, high, or warm). view larger Cooks decadent desserts to perfection. view larger Optimized for casseroles, one-pot meals, lasagna, and other favorites. view larger 9-by-13-inch removable stoneware can go in the oven for cooking or warming food. view larger CROCK-POT 3.5-QUART CASSEROLE CROCK SLOW COOKER
Make mealtime marvelous with help from this ultra-convenient Casserole Crock slow cooker by Crock-Pot. The rectangular-shaped unit's 9-by-13-inch stoneware offers 3-1/2 quarts of cooking space--perfect for cooking casseroles, lasagnas, desserts, and more.

MAKE-AHEAD MEALS AND EASY ENTERTAINING
After a long day, come home to hot-and-ready meals like creamy chicken casserole, flavorful lasagna, or savory baby-back ribs. Simply add ingredients to the stoneware, secure the lid, and turn the heat to Low or High for slow, thorough cooking. The Casserole Crock makes it easy to enjoy delicious recipes, robust and tantalizing flavors, and effortless meals from the comfort of home.

The Casserole Crock slow cooker also frees up additional cooking space when entertaining, which can be particularly helpful during the holidays when space is limited. Use the conventional oven for the turkey and potatoes, while the Casserole Crock slow cooker takes care of the green bean casserole or other favorite dish. Don't forget dessert--from mouthwatering strawberry-rhubarb crisps to blueberry cobblers, this slow cooker's got you covered there, too.

TRAVEL FRIENDLY--WITH LOCKING LID FOR PEACE OF MIND
Whether it's a casual potluck or an elegant buffet, the Casserole Crock slow cooker makes transporting meals a snap. The unit's portable design includes an onboard cord wrap for tidy travel, a gasket lid liner on the inside for a tight seal, and two side clamps that hook from the lid to the base and clamp down, locking the lid in place. No need to worry about spills or sloshing about; now you can breathe easy when taking those turns or heading uphill.

A true performer, the Casserole Crock slow cooker can also be used as a server (no need to dirty a second dish). Simply unlock and remove the lid, plug in the slow cooker, and turn the dial to "warm" to keep food at a ready-to-serve temperature. The slow cooker also provides large side handles for safe, secure transport from the car to the kitchen or buffet and back again.

OVEN-TO-CROCK CONVENIENCE
For added versatility, you can cook any number of family-favorite recipes in your full-size oven, then transport the stoneware from the oven to the Casserole Crock heating base for safe, easy travel and/or to keep the dish warm once dinner is served.

PORTABLE DESIGN FOR EASE AND VERSATILITY
LOCK
Portable design with side clamps that securely lock the lid in place. view larger TRANSPORT
Large side handles for safe transport from the kitchen to the car or buffet. view larger SERVE
Slow cooker doubles as an elegant server. view larger ADDITIONAL FEATURES
The Casserole Crock slow cooker's manual control knob allows for setting the temperature to Low, High, or Warm, and its removable stoneware and locking lid clean up easily by hand or in the dishwasher. Housed in navy blue with white accents, the attractive slow cooker makes an elegant choice for any social gathering. 

LID AND STONEWARE USAGE
Part Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe Microwave Safe Stovetop Safe Lid Yes No No No Stoneware Yes Yes, but not in the broiler Yes No WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
Crock-Pot SCCPCCM350-BL Casserole Crock slow cooker, Campbell's classic recipes, user manual with recipes
feature_bullets: 9" x 13" oven-safe rectangular removable stoneware is the perfect size and shape to cook and serve casseroles, lasagnas, and other great dishes
Manual Low, High, and Warm Settings to slow cook and warm food
Cook & Carry locking lid system for ease on the go
